org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.transaction
Interface IAeTransaction

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAeSQLTransaction, IAeXMLDBTransaction
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeNoopTransactionManagerFactory.AeNoopTransaction, AeSQLTransaction, AeXMLDBTransaction
public interface IAeTransaction

Defines interface for a transaction on the current thread.

Method Summary
 void begin()
          Begins a new transaction.
 void commit()
          Commits the current transaction.
 boolean isActive()
          Returns true if and only if a transaction is active.
 void rollback()
          Rolls back the current transaction.
 

Method Detail

Throws:

public boolean isActive()
Returns true if and only if a transaction is active.

              throws AeTransactionException
Rolls back the current transaction.
